column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////When we asked what we had done to be offensive
column2: both server and manager answered "nothing" and that they were "looking out for our safety". 4 out of 5 in my party are physicians and are better trained to recognize signs of over drinking than the staff at this restaurant. It seemed likely that our waiter just made a bad call and the manager was trying to stand by him
column3: but doesn't make up for the fact that we were all wildly offended and weren't able to enjoy our time there. Won't be going back.
